I18N_ANDROID_PAGE_BETA_DESCRIPTION:
A beta version of the Android app is now available in English,
Brazilian, Portuguese, and Swahili. The app is free, and no
subscription is needed.
I18N_ANDROID_PAGE_CONSENT_CHECKBOX_LABEL: You confirm that you are over the age of 18 or that you have consent and approval from your legal parent or guardian.
I18N_ANDROID_PAGE_FEATURE_SUBTEXT_1: And try our helpful hints to guide you along
I18N_ANDROID_PAGE_FEATURE_SUBTEXT_2: Play lessons even without an Internet connection.
I18N_ANDROID_PAGE_FEATURE_SUBTEXT_4: Create and maintain up to 10 profiles on one device.
I18N_ANDROID_PAGE_FEEDBACK_TEXT:
Let us know at android@oppia.org
if you have any feedback or would like to sign up for updates
I18N_ANDROID_PAGE_UPDATES_MAIN_TEXT:
Want updates on
Oppia and the app?
I18N_ANDROID_PAGE_VERSIONS_SUPPORTED_TEX: We support all Android versions going back to Lollipop (Android 5).
I18N_BLOG_POST_THUMBNAIL_PICTURE_ERROR: Kesalahan: File gambar tidak dapat dibaca.
I18N_CONGRATULATORY_CHECKPOINT_MESSAGE_S: Anda membuat kemajuan yang baik! Lanjutkan!
I18N_DASHBOARD_EXPLORATIONS_EMPTY_MESSAG: Sepertinya Anda belum membuat penjelajahan lagi. Mari kita mulai!
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_BUDGET_SUBHEADING_EXPLA: Your donations strengthen our global partnerships and help us reach  and support new learning communities.
Your donations help with our efforts in raising awareness of Oppia across the world.
Donations keep the Oppia platforms and servers running smoothly and reliably.
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_FAQ_ANSWER_1: Oppia is a supplementary online educational platform that aims to address the needs of learners who lack access to quality education. We hope the platform and lessons will help make high-quality education accessible to as many learners as possible.
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_FAQ_ANSWER_10: For general questions about Oppia, please reach out to contact@oppia.org.
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_FAQ_ANSWER_2: Oppia exists to help improve equitable access to education. Many online platforms (e.g. college-level MOOC courses) favor learners who already have basic education. Those platforms also require that learners have internet connectivity, motivation to learn on their own, good knowledge of English and basic literacy etc. However, this is not true for students in underserved communities and regions, and can widen socioeconomic gaps. Oppia narrows that gap by including features specifically aimed at under-resourced communities.
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_FAQ_ANSWER_3: Since its inception, the Oppia platform has served over 1.5 million learners worldwide. Oppia has run some small-scale studies, including randomized tests, to measure the effectiveness of lessons, and these have shown positive results. The team is currently working on providing more data to show the impact that the platform is having across the world, and will continue to conduct more studies.
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_FAQ_ANSWER_4_1: Oppia's focus on access to education sets it apart from other online platforms. Many current providers use video lessons, which can be inaccessible to learners in areas without reliable internet connection. Oppia's lessons do not need much bandwidth, and encourage students to experiment and problem-solve.
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_FAQ_ANSWER_4_2: Oppia also focuses on under-resourced regions, including South America, Sub-Saharan Africa, and South/Southeast Asia. By targeting and localising our lessons, educational materials, and platform to these regions, we ensure that our platform is accessible to those who need it and maximize our impact in those regions.
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_FAQ_ANSWER_5: Yes, we are a 501(c)(3) tax-exempt organization and your donation is tax-deductible within the guidelines of U.S. law.
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_FAQ_ANSWER_6: Please do not give by check, and consider donating by card or through Paypal.
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_FAQ_ANSWER_7: Yes, but Oppia will not automatically file for such gifts. Please check with your employer if necessary.
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_FAQ_ANSWER_8: We do not accept donations of stock or by wire transfer. Please consider donating by card or through Paypal.
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_FAQ_QUESTION_10: I would like to find out more about Oppia. Who can I reach out to?
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_FAQ_QUESTION_3: How is Oppia measuring impact and what has the platform accomplished so far?
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_FAQ_QUESTION_4: What makes Oppia different from other online education platforms?
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_FAQ_QUESTION_6: How do I give by check?
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_FAQ_QUESTION_7: Do you accept employee matching gifts?
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_FAQ_QUESTION_8: Can I donate stock or make my donation by wire transfer?
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_FAQ_QUESTION_9: Is there someone I can talk to if I am interested in becoming a corporate partner?
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_HEADING_1: Join us in ensuring access to
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_LEARNER_FEEDBACK_TEXT_1: I liked learning the lessons on mobile because we get very good questions and if we get something wrong we are told how to correct it and we are not scared when we are doing this I really liked this app.
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_LEARNER_FEEDBACK_TEXT_2: I enjoyed playing the lesson a lot, I did not feel bored and I feel like I master the negative numbers now.
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_LEARNER_FEEDBACK_TEXT_3: I really had fun while solving the questions because they had many colorful shapes and images. The images made it easier to understand the topics as well!
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_STATISTIC_3: Randomized trial completed, with more to come
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_STATISTIC_4: Volunteers from all over the globe
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_SUBSCRIBE_MODAL_TEXT_1: You will start receiving updates in your inbox soon. We promise not to spam, and you can unsubscribe at any time.
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_SUBSCRIBE_MODAL_TEXT_2: With help and support from our community (including you!), Oppia has and continues to serve the most under-resourced learners around the world.
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_SUBSCRIBE_SECTION_TEXT_: Become a part of the movement in bringing effective, engaging education to underserved learners around the world. Sign up for our newsletter to get updates and learn more about how you can get involved.
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_THANKS_MODAL_TEXT_1: With your help and support, Oppia will be able to continue serving the most underserved learners around the world.
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_THANKS_MODAL_TEXT_2: Learn more about Oppia and the impact that your support will have
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_THANKS_MODAL_TEXT_3: If you have any questions, please reach out at anytime.
I18N_DONATE_PAGE_VISION_TEXT: To date, Oppia has served more than 1.5 million learners around the world - many of whom come from the world's more underserved areas. Oppia relies on donations, and with just $11, you can help us continue our work and expand the reach of our platform, to expand equitable education for all.
I18N_ERROR_DISABLED_EXPLORATION_MESSAGE: Maaf, eksplorasi yang anda pilih sedang nonaktif. Mohon coba lagi lain kali.
I18N_ERROR_MESSAGE_400: Terkadang mesin tidak dapat mengerti manusia. Ini salah satu kejadiannya.
I18N_ERROR_MESSAGE_401: Anda tidak boleh masuk ke situ. Cepat kembali sebelum guru datang!
I18N_ERROR_MESSAGE_404: Maaf, kami sudah mencari berkali-kali tapi halaman itu tetap tidak bisa ditemukan.
I18N_ERROR_MESSAGE_500: Sesuatu yang sangat buruk terjadi. Tapi itu bukan karena anda. Kesalahan internal terjadi.
I18N_ERROR_NEXT_STEPS: Sebaiknya anda kembali ke halaman utama. Namun, jika masalah ini terulang padahal seharusnya tidak, mohon beritahu kami melalui issue tracker kami. Mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanannya.
I18N_FORMS_TYPE_NUMBER_INVALID_DECIMAL: Mohon isi angka desimal yang valid.
I18N_INTERACTIONS_ITEM_SELECTION_NOT_ENO: {minChoiceNumber, plural, one{Mohon pilih minimal 1.} other{Mohon pilih minimal #.}}
I18N_INTERACTIONS_ITEM_SELECTION_PREVENT: {maxAllowableSelectionCount, plural, one{Maksimal 1 pilihan saja.} other{Maksimal # pilihan saja.}}
I18N_INTERACTIONS_PENCILCODEEDITOR_ARE_Y: Apakah Anda yakin ingin mengatur ulang kode Anda?
I18N_INTERACTIONS_SET_INPUT_DUPLICATES_E: Ups, sepertinya isian anda mengandung duplikat!
I18N_LIBRARY_MAIN_HEADER: Bayangkan apa yang dapat Anda pelajari hari ini...
I18N_LIBRARY_NO_EXPLORATIONS: Ups, tidak ada eksplorasi yang dapat ditampilkan.
I18N_LIBRARY_NO_EXPLORATION_FOR_QUERY: Ups, sepertinya tidak ada eksplorasi yang sesuai dengan pencarian anda.
I18N_LIBRARY_NO_EXPLORATION_GROUPS: Tidak ada grup eksplorasi yang dapat ditampilkan.
I18N_LIBRARY_SUB_HEADER: Mulai petualangan anda dengan melihat koleksi eksplorasi kami.
I18N_PLAYER_RATE_EXPLORATION: Belajar sesuatu yang baru? Bagaimana penilaian anda terhadap eksplorasi ini?
I18N_PLAYER_REPORT_MODAL_BODY_ADDITIONAL: Harap memberikan rincian tambahan untuk moderator:
I18N_PLAYER_REPORT_SUCCESS_MODAL_BODY: Laporan anda telah diteruskan ke moderator untuk diperiksa.
I18N_PLAYER_SHARE_EXPLORATION: Nikmati eksplorasi ini? Berbagi dengan teman anda!
I18N_PREFERENCES_BIO_EXPLAIN_TEXT: Isian ini tidak wajib. Semua yang anda tulis di sini bersifat publik dan dapat dilihat oleh dunia.
I18N_PREFERENCES_EMAIL_EXPLAIN: Hanya moderator dan admin situs yang dapat melihat ini.
I18N_PREFERENCES_EMAIL_RECEIVE_NEWS: Terima berita dan pemberitahuan mengenai situs ini
I18N_PREFERENCES_HEADING_SUBTEXT: Semua perubahan yang anda lakukan di halaman ini akan tersimpan secara otomatis.
I18N_PREFERENCES_PREFERRED_EXPLORATION_L: Bahasa-bahasa ini akan terpilih secara otomatis ketika anda mencari eksplorasi di galeri.
I18N_PREFERENCES_PREFERRED_SITE_LANGUAGE: Situs ini ditampilkan menggunakan bahasa ini.
I18N_PREFERENCES_PROFILE_PICTURE_DRAG: Tarik untuk memotong dan mengubah ukuran:
I18N_PREFERENCES_PROFILE_PICTURE_ERROR: Kesalahan: File gambar tidak dapat dibaca.
I18N_PREFERENCES_SUBJECT_INTERESTS_INVAL: Tambahkan minat subjek baru (gunakan huruf kecil dan spasi)...
I18N_SIGNUP_AGREE_LICENSE_DESCRIPTION: Dengan mencentang kotak di sebelah kiri teks ini, anda mengetahui, menyetujui, dan menerima untuk terikat oleh Ketentuan Penggunaan <[sitename]>, yang terletak di sini.
I18N_SIGNUP_EMAIL_PREFERENCES_EXPLAIN: Anda dapat mengganti pengaturan ini kapan saja dari halaman Preferensi anda.
I18N_SIGNUP_ERROR_MUST_AGREE_TO_TERMS: Agar dapat mengubah eksplorasi di situs ini, anda harus menyetujui ketentuan situs ini.
I18N_SIGNUP_ERROR_USERNAME_ONLY_ALPHANUM: Username hanya boleh menggunakan karakter alfanumerik.
I18N_SIGNUP_ERROR_USERNAME_WITH_SPACES: Pastikan username anda tidak mengandung spasi.
I18N_SIGNUP_LICENSE_NOTE: Mohon diperhatikan, dengan menyetujui Ketentuan Penggunaan kami, Anda setuju bahwa segala materi atau kontribusi yang anda lakukan dalam Situs kami akan berada di bawah lisensi CC-BY-SA v.4.0, dengan persyaratan pengabaian atribusi. Mohon tinjau Ketentuan Penggunaan kami untuk informasi lebih lanjut mengenai pemberian lisensi tersebut. Untuk informasi lebih lanjut mengenai CC-BY-SA, klik di sini.
I18N_SIGNUP_LICENSE_OBJECTIVE: Menggunakan lisensi <[licenselink]> membebaskan isi eksplorasi untuk disalin, digunakan kembali, didaur ulang, dan didistribusikan kembali. Persyaratan yang utama adalah jika seseorang mendaur ulang, mengubah, atau menambahi material tersebut, ia juga harus mendistribusikan karyanya di bawah lisensi bebas yang sama.
I18N_SIGNUP_SEND_ME_NEWS: Kirimkan saya berita dan pemberitahuan tentang situs ini
I18N_SIGNUP_SITE_DESCRIPTION: <[sitename]> adalah lahan sumber pembelajaran terbuka. Semua material di dalamnya dapat dipergunakan kembali dan dibagikan secara bebas.
I18N_SIGNUP_SITE_OBJECTIVE: <[sitename]> tercipta untuk memperkuat kreasi dan pengembangan berkelanjutan kumpulan materi pembelajaran berkualitas tinggi yang tersedia secara bebas untuk semua orang.
I18N_SIGNUP_UPDATE_WARNING: Mohon perhatikan bahwa kami baru saja memperbarui Ketentuan Penggunaan kami.
I18N_SIGNUP_USERNAME_EXPLANATION: Username anda akan ditampilkan di sebelah kontribusi anda.
I18N_SPLASH_FIRST_EXPLORATION_DESCRIPTIO: Pelajaran di Oppia, juga dikenal sebagai eksplorasi, memberikan pengalaman lebih dalam dari video atau teks statis, membantu pengguna belajar sambil mempraktekkan.
I18N_SPLASH_JAVASCRIPT_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: Oppia adalah platform pendidikan sumber terbuka dan bebas, penuh dengan aktivitas interaktif bernama 'eksplorasi'. Sayangnya, Oppia membutuhkan JavaScript diaktifkan dalam web browser Anda agar dapat berfungsi dengan baik, namun JavaScript browser web Anda nonaktif. Jika Anda perlu bantuan mengaktifkan JavaScript, klik di sini.
I18N_SPLASH_JAVASCRIPT_ERROR_TITLE: Kami Membutuhkan JavaScript dalam Browser Anda
I18N_SPLASH_SECOND_EXPLORATION_DESCRIPTI: Eksplorasi mudah dibuat. Sesuaikan materi dengan mudah berdasarkan feedback individual murid dan tren dari pengalaman semua pelajar anda dari seluruh dunia.
I18N_SPLASH_SUBTITLE: Oppia mempermudah penciptaan pelajaran interaktif yang mendidik dan menarik.
I18N_SPLASH_THIRD_EXPLORATION_DESCRIPTIO: Oppia memungkinkan Anda untuk menciptakan dan membagikan eksplorasi dalam berbagai subjek, terbatas hanya pada imajinasi Anda.
